programme.desc: Two friends from Brooklyn (Jerry O'Connell), (Anthony Anderson) are forced to deliver mob money to Australia. When the kangaroo bounces off, they realize the mob money is in the jacket and are forced to give chase through the Outback.

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: Once a first-rate Secret Service agent, Joe Hallenbeck (Bruce Willis) is now a gruff private investigator whose latest gig is protecting a pole dancer (Halle Berry). When she's murdered, he grudgingly teams up with her boyfriend, Jimmy Dix (Damon Wayans), an ex-quarterback with a gambling problem, and the two go after her killers. Before long, they stumble onto a plot by a well-known football magnate (Noble Willingham) to bribe federal legislators into legalizing sports gambling.

programme.title: Swordfish
programme.desc: Behind the world's most sophisticated security systems, billions of illegal government funds lie. Gabriel Shear plans to finance his own brand of ruthless patriotism if he can break into this virtual Fort Knox. He needs parolee Stanley Jobson, the only man capable of penetrating the layers of firewalls and encrypted passwords. Now Shear and his partner Ginger use every lure, including the promise to reunite Jobson with his daughter, to obtain the greatest computer hack ever.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: Clyde Shelton is an honorable family man, until the day his wife and daughter are murdered in a home invasion. He hopes for justice, but a rising prosecutor named Nick Rice cuts a deal with one of the killers in exchange for testimony. Ten years later, that man is found dead.

programme.title: Exit Wounds
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as maverick Detroit police detective Orin Boyd, whose take-no-prisoners approach to domestic terrorism gets him booted downtown to the city's toughest precinct. Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: U.S. Sgt. Dunn (Keenen Ivory Wayans) is sentenced to death for a crime he didn't commit, but he gets a second chance when Lt. Col. Grant Casey (Jon Voight) handpicks him for a dangerous secret mission. Unfortunately, Dunn soon finds out that his assignment is a setup, and he is framed for the murder of the president's wife. Dunn goes on the run from the law with Dr. Constantini (Jill Hennessy), who knows the true identity of the assassin. But Casey will do anything to silence the pair.

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: A heroic loner takes on a group of nuclear terrorists in this seagoing tale. Posing as a rock band, the terrorists get themselves hired for a party aboard the USS Missouri, a battleship en route to Pearl Harbor for decommissioning. They plan to steal the ship's nuclear arsenal but haven't reckoned on the intervention of the ship's chef, a decorated former Navy SEAL.

programme.title: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
programme.desc: Former U.S. Navy SEAL Casey Ryback (Steven Seagal) has left the armed forces to lead a quiet life as a chef in Denver. While taking time off from his new job, Ryback decides to go on a scenic train trip with his niece Sarah (Katherine Heigl). When the arrival of evil genius Travis Dane (Eric Bogosian) and an international team of hijackers interrupts their relaxing journey through the majestic Rocky Mountains, Ryback must get involved and save the day.

programme.desc: A dog trainer is in the dog house after her boyfriend of two years finds condoms in her purse.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A woman questions her boyfriend's fidelity after finding scandalous photos of him with half-naked women while he was on an international tour.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A Kentucky woman brings her ex-boyfriend to court to prove that he is the father of her 29-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: Tired of her ex-boyfriend dodging child support, the mother of a 3-year-old child brings her ex-boyfriend to court to prove that he is the biological father of her son.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: There's drama in the courtroom when a Georgia woman faces a former friend who claims her son fathered her 3-month-old baby.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A heartbroken Texas man brings his current girlfriend to court to finally put his doubts to rest about the paternity of her 3-month-old baby boy.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie discovers a major New Orleans mob real estate scam is behind the scheme to force his daughter from her home and acquire her land.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Harriet consults Gillespie after she reluctantly agrees to help her son get his imprisoned father's murder conviction reversed.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: After threatening two boys (John Aaron Bennett, Zach McLemore) who trespassed on his property, a dangerous man (Jason Byce) is shot dead in his home. With Carroll O'Connor.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Delivery man Leo Jackson (Donald Faison) is definitely on the wrong road to success. He still lives at home, he and his girlfriend just broke up, and he has multiple complaints stacked against him at work. Fortunately, Leo has plenty of marijuana to keep his mind off his troubles. But when he accidentally delivers a box of cocaine to the wrong address, Leo finds himself in the middle of a bad deal that may just cost him his life.

programme.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: Ladies' man Darnell Wright (Martin Lawrence) is used to getting his way with women. Although he is committed to marrying his longtime love, Mia (Regina King), he can't help himself when he meets the beautiful and standoffish Brandi (Lynn Whitfield). After bedding and then trying to ditch Brandi, Darnell is in for an unpleasant surprise: the unhinged Brandi is not about to let Darnell dump her, and she will do anything to exact revenge on him for tossing her aside.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his closest allies and help him discover the truth about his parents' mysterious deaths.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Emergency Room Essen
programme.desc: Wenn am Wochenende die Hausarztpraxen geschlossen sind, geht es hoch her in der Notaufnahme des Uniklinikums Essen. Patienten mit Verdacht auf Herzinfarkt, Schlaganfall oder andere lebensbedrohliche Krankheiten, werden sofort behandelt. Doch wer mit Husten, Schnupfen, Heiserkeit oder sonstigen Lappalien kommt, muss sich erstmal hintenanstellen. Wartezeit: manchmal über sieben Stunden.

programme.title: Eignungstest für Lebensretter
programme.desc: Dienst rund um die Uhr und die Bereitschaft, im Notfall die eigene Gesundheit zu riskieren. Feuerwehrmann zu sein ist ein knochenharter Job. Trotzdem bewerben sich Tausende jährlich um die Laufbahn des Lebensretters. Die Hürden sind hoch, viele scheitern an den Vorgaben. Wer es in die Vorauswahl geschafft hat, muss sich einem körperlichen Eignungstest unterziehen.

programme.title: Ein Lächeln für Manila
programme.desc: Es ist heiß im provisorischen Operationssaal in Manila, die Außentemperaturen liegen bei 40 Grad Celsius. Im Akkord werden gerade an drei Tischen Kinder gleichzeitig operiert. Seit 20 Jahren reist der plastische Chirurg Christopher Wachsmuth in seinem Jahresurlaub auf die Philippinen, um Kinder mit einer Lippen-Kiefer-Gaumenspalte zu operieren.

Deutschlands älteste Berufsfeuerwehr arbeitet am Limit. Besonders betroffen: der Stadtteil Neukölln. Mehr als 2000 Mal im Monat rücken hier die Retter vom Dienst aus. Die Menschen greifen immer schneller zum Hörer und wählen 112, auch wenn‘s nicht wirklich brennt. Die Arbeit im rauen Bezirk im Zentrum Berlins gilt als besonders fordernd und spannend und zieht deshalb vor allem Feuerwehrleute an.

Die Neuköllner Feuerwehrleute werden zu einem Motorrad-Unfall gerufen. Vor Ort wartet bereits eine Menschenmenge aus ebenso unbeteiligten, wie störenden Zuschauern. Gaffen aus Sensationslust und Respektlosigkeit gegenüber den Rettern ist in Neukölln ein wachsendes Problem. Stress ohne Ende - wenn die Arbeit der Feuerwehr zum Hindernislauf wird.

Ein selbstmordgefährdeter Mann, eine Wohnung unter Wasser und ein Mann mit Verfolgungswahn. Neukölln gehört zu Berlins ärmsten Bezirken. Die Auswirkungen beschäftigen auch die Männer von der Feuerwehr rund um die Uhr. In einem Fall müssen die Retter sogar mehrmals ausrücken: Ein Obdachloser will partout nicht ins Krankenhaus. Einsatz in Neukölln - wenn die Armut krankmacht.

Diesmal hält ein Wohnungsbrand in der Sonnenallee die Männer der Feuerwache Neukölln in Atem. Kaum angekommen, wird ihnen klar: Es sind noch Menschen in dem brennenden Haus. Die Wohnungen sind aber schwer zu erreichen. Jetzt wird allen alles abverlangt. Es bleibt jedoch nicht bei diesem Großeinsatz in ihrer Schicht.

Neun Autos stehen in einem Neuköllner Hinterhof in Flammen - ein Einsatz, auch für erfahrene Feuerwehrmänner nicht alltäglich. War es Brandstiftung? Eine andere Herausforderung für die Truppe ist der Notruf aus einer Laubenkolonie: Ein Mann mit Herzinfarkt. Es geht um Leben und Tod.

programme.title: Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: We hit the red carpet for a look at the state of Europe's film industry, from Venice to London. In the face of economic uncertainty and rising tariffs, how will the creative industry respond? As countries like Italy and the UK replace Hollywood as the go-to destinations for on-location shooting, we speak to some of the major players in the industry to find out how Europe has catapulted itself forward, and whether it can stay at the front of the pack.

programme.title: Reign of Fire
programme.desc: In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn watches as his mother wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its centuries-long slumber. Twenty years later, much of the world has been scarred by the beast and its offspring. As a fire chief, Quinn (Christian Bale) is responsible for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence. Into their midst comes a hotshot American, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), who says he has a way to kill the beasts.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A professional assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) gets caught up in a dangerous political takeover. He flees across Eastern Europe, hoping to find out who set him up and why. However, his growing attachment to a beautiful but traumatized young woman poses as great a threat to his survival as that of the Interpol and Russian agents who are hunting him down.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: Con Air: Unrated Extended Edition
programme.desc: Just-paroled army ranger Cameron Poe (Nicolas Cage) is headed back to his wife (Monica Potter), but must fly home aboard a prison transport flight dubbed "Jailbird" with some of the worst criminals living. Along with Diamond Dog (Ving Rhames) and Baby-O (Mykelti Williamson), genius serial killer Cyrus "The Virus" Grissom (John Malkovich) unleashes a violent escape plot in mid-flight. Secretly working with U.S. Marshall Vince Larkin (John Cusack), Poe tries to foil Grissom's plan.

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw, Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel), Brian O'Conner (Paul Walker) and the rest of the crew have separated to return to more normal lives. However, Deckard Shaw , Owen's older brother, is thirsty for revenge. A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.

programme.title: The Equalizer 3 - The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Since giving up his life as a government assassin, Robert McCall finds solace in serving justice on behalf of the oppressed. Now living in Southern Italy, he soon discovers his new friends are under the control of local crime bosses. As events turn deadly, McCall becomes their protector by taking on the mafia.

programme.desc: Lee spends a day with his worst enemy.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned during the Sudanese Civil War, a group of young refugees are given the opportunity to leave their camp and resettle in America.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Benicio del Toro & Tim Robbins star in this war zone comedy where a band of rescue workers are confronted with a crisis.

programme.title: The Journey
programme.desc: After 40 years of "The Troubles" in Northern Ireland the leading players meet at St. Andrews to try and hammer out a final and lasting peace agreement.

programme.title: A 2nd Chance
programme.desc: A 2nd Chance is a children's and family film based around gymnastics. It's an inspirational feel good story about a young gymnast and her coach overcoming adversity for a chance to win a place in the national gymnastics team.

programme.title: Ruth & Alex
programme.desc: When Ruth and Alex opt to put their apartment on the market over one crazy weekend, they discover that finding a new apartment is not about winding down...

programme.title: The Last Full Measure
programme.desc: Thirty four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. Pits is awarded the nations highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.

programme.title: The Public
programme.desc: The Public is about downtown Cincinnati librarians Stuart Goodson and Myra who see their regular winter day shaken up when homeless patrons decide to take shelter in their library for the night. What starts as a peaceful sit-in quickly escalates into a face-off with the police and the media.

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.title: A Single Man
programme.desc: Previously featured at the London Film Festival. A SINGLE MAN, tells the story of a British professor who dwells on the past and cannot see his future. We follow him through a single day, where a series of events leads him to decide if there is meaning to life after the death of his partner,Jim.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Benicio del Toro & Tim Robbins star in this war zone comedy where a band of rescue workers are confronted with a crisis.

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Russell Crowe stars as Noah, a man chosen by God for a great task before an apocalyptic flood destroys the world.

programme.title: Five Nights in Maine
programme.desc: A man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting grief. With David Oyelowo and Dianne Wiest.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Billy (Vince Vaughn) and Nick (Owen Wilson) are salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital world. Trying to prove they are not obsolete, they defy the odds by talking their way into a coveted internship at Google, along with a battalion of brilliant college students.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Fire on the Amazon
programme.desc: A photojournalist (Craig Sheffer) and an environmental activist (Sandra Bullock) investigate the murder of a famous environmentalist deep in the hot and steamy Amazonian jungle.

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Armand and Albert have built the perfect life for themselves tending to their Miami nightclub. But their pastel tranquility is shaken when Armand's son announces that he's getting married to the daughter of ultra-conservative Senator Keeley... and they're all getting together for dinner!

What starts out as just another day on the job quickly turns into a life-or-death struggle for a soft-spoken American co-pilot when a group of terrorists attempt to take control of his Paris-bound flight.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: In this outrageous spoof of "found footage" movies, young couple Malcolm (Marlon Wayans) and Kisha (Essence Atkins) have just moved into their dream house. As they settle in, they quickly find they're not alone. But it's not the house that's haunted, it's Malcolm's girlfriend!

programme.title: Hudson
programme.desc: After his mother's death, Hudson, a reclusive but charming man, embarks on a journey with his distant cousin to scatter his mother's ashes in the Hudson Valley region of New York.

programme.title: High Crimes
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes embroiled in a huge military cover-up when it's revealed her husband is not who he says he is.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Ray is a fussy nine-year-old girl whose last nanny just ran out. When Ray's way-too-busy mom hires Molly to be Ray's new nanny, it's the perfect setup for both girls to change their ways and discover that sometimes your best friend can come in the form that you least expect!

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: When the wedding of super star Lara Tyler (Alice Eve - Bombshell) to tweedy English author James Arber (David Tennant – Doctor Who) is sabotaged by paparazzi, they decide to relocate the event to the one place where the world's press won't find them.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century.

programme.title: Dan In Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a woman (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: The Grand Seduction
programme.desc: Brendan Gleeson is Murray, a once proud fisherman who now, along with his former colleagues in the harbour of Tickle Head are out of work and forced to live off welfare.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife, his friend and his son to launch a food truck.

programme.title: Sam & Kate
programme.desc: Starring Academy Award®-winners Dustin Hoffman and Sissy Spacek, Sam & Kate is a heartwarming, multi-generational family story bringing together four people who are given a second chance at love, and life.

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: A man caught in the middle of two simultaneous robberies at the same bank desperately tries to protect the teller with whom he's secretly in love.

programme.title: Elvis & Nixon
programme.desc: Get ready for the astonishing true story of when Elvis Presley met President Nixon. At 6.30am on December 21st 1970, the King of Rock'n Roll showed up on the lawn of the White House to request a meeting with the most powerful man in the world, President Richard Nixon.

programme.desc: Everything is running smoothly for popular radio DJ Dr. Emma Lloyd in the run up to her own wedding when she makes the shocking discovery: she's already married – and to someone else!

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: L'émission revient sous le feu des projecteurs pour une 20e saison anniversaire explosive qui célèbre la création sous toutes ses formes. De l'humour à la magie, du chant à la contorsion, en passant par la danse ou les circassiens, place à une rafale de performances inédites et de disciplines émergentes.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: Toujours aussi enthousiastes et complices, Hélène Ségara, Marianne James, Eric Antoine et Sugar Sammy reviennent derrière les buzzers pour une saison imprévisible. Karine Le Marchand, elle, se montre bienveillante envers les candidats, entre émotion, complicité et éclats de rire.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent, ça continue
programme.desc: Juju Fitcats propose un rendez-vous à la fois amusant et surprenant qui plonge dans les coulisses de \"La France a un incroyable talent\". Elle part à la rencontre des candidats pour recueillir leurs réactions à chaud, mais aussi celles des membres du jury. Au programme également des images inédites ainsi que des séquences tirées des différentes déclinaisons du programme à travers le monde.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: Caramel et beurre salé sont au menu de cette sixième semaine de compétition, qui met le cap sur la Bretagne. La première épreuve amène les concurrents à revisiter le kouign-amann tout en conservant les fondamentaux. Mercotte a déniché une recette du XIXe siècle, venue du Finistère : le farz pitilig souezhenn.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: L'épée Excalibur, la fée Morgane, les korrigans ou encore Merlin l'enchanteur : les pâtissiers devront réveiller les mythes et créatures légendaires bretonnes à travers un gâteau spectaculaire pour la troisième et dernière épreuve. Yvan Chevalier, maître chocolatier de renom installé à Rennes et sacré Meilleur Ouvrier de France, donnera conseils et astuces à chacun tout au long de l'épreuve.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier : qui réintégrera la tente ?
programme.desc: Le pâtissier sortant du jour affronte le gagnant du face-à-face de la semaine précédente pour mettre à l'honneur un incontournable de la cuisine bretonne : le caramel. Noémie et Mohamed livrent leurs astuces et prodiguent des conseils de professionnels pour parfaitement réussir le caramel au beurre salé.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: Au fil des saisons, les pâtissiers ont exploré différents pays, du Japon à l'Italie en passant par le Portugal ou l'Espagne, en réalisant des desserts emblématiques.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: La thématique de la nature a été à plusieurs reprises au coeur des épreuves des différentes saisons du \"Meilleur Pâtissier\", comme le rappelle ce florilège.

programme.title: On n'est pas d'accord !
programme.desc: Au programme : - Lucie contre Daniel : un rêve qui s'effondre. Lucie a acheté une maison à Daniel. Trois ans plus tard, l'extension menace la structure, rongée par l'humidité. - Jean-David contre François-Xavier : une terre pour deux familles. - Pauline et Jimmy contre Léa et Antoine : une amitié qui prend l'eau.

programme.title: On n'est pas d'accord !
programme.desc: Vice caché, différend sur l'exploitation d'un terrain, amitié entre propriétaires et locataires remise en cause par un appartement, Julien Courbet arbitre différents conflits en réunissant les parties sur le plateau pour écouter leurs arguments et en envoyant un enquêteur sur place pour vérifier.

programme.title: On n'est pas d'accord !
programme.desc: Au sommaire : - Pauline contre Michel : la maison de la colère. Pauline loue une maison à Michel depuis deux ans, mais la situation devient un cauchemar à cause de l'humidité et des défauts. - Olivia contre Marijana : la guerre des étages. - Gwendoline et Ludovic contre Yvon : des voisins aux abois.

programme.title: On n'est pas d'accord !
programme.desc: La maison que Pauline loue à Michel est affectée par l'humidité et des défauts, ce que le propriétaire conteste. Olivia se plaint des bruits incessants de la famille qui habite dans l'appartement du dessous. Quant à Gwendoline et Ludovic, ces éleveurs de chiens subissent les plaintes de leur voisin Yvon, dérangé par les aboiements incessants.

programme.title: On n'est pas d'accord !
programme.desc: Frédéric souhaite rénover sa grange mais impossible d'y accéder car son voisin Daniel a bloqué le chemin. Suite à des difficultés personnelles, Aurore a confié à Sabrina quatre de ses chiens. Sabrina ne veut pas lui rendre les deux derniers. Céline et Sarah refusent de rembourser Corentin et Sylvain.

programme.title: On n'est pas d'accord !
programme.desc: Julien Courbet arbitre différents conflits qui opposent Frédéric à son voisin Daniel, Aurore à Sabrina quant à la garde des chiens de la première et Corentin et Sylvain à Cécile et Sarah.

programme.desc: En 18 minutes, vous saurez tout sur l'actualité grâce à cette émission qui conjugue force des images, pédagogie dans le traitement des informations et rythme d'un journal qui va à l'essentiel.

programme.title: Scènes de ménages - Saison 0
programme.desc: Quel que soit l'âge, quels que soient les caractères, quelles que soient les occupations, aucun couple n'échappe aux scènes de ménages, qu'il s'agisse de taquineries mesquines ou de joutes verbales qui font voler les assiettes, Marion et Cédric, Liliane et José, Huguette et Raymond et d'autres en font la démonstration. Heureusement, la tendresse s'invite aussi parfois, entre deux disputes.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine - Saison 13
programme.desc: Le chef Philippe Etchebest se rend à Bertholène, une jolie petite commune située à quelques kilomètres de Rodez dans l'Aveyron. C'est Marie, cheffe de cuisine, qui a fait appel à lui. Elle travaille avec son fils Emmanuel, qui a repris le seul restaurant du village il y a 6 ans. Si à leurs débuts l'affaire fonctionnait bien, aujourd'hui les clients ont déserté l'établissement.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine - Saison 13
programme.desc: Au fur et à mesure de la découverte des lieux du restaurant de Marie et Emmanuel, Philippe Etchebest se demande comment il va pouvoir redresser la situation, tant les problèmes se sont accumulés avec le temps. A Bertholène, le chef va devoir la jouer fine pour sauver le restaurant local. De plus, Philippe Etchebest finit par comprendre qu'un élément peut peut-être tout changer au final.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: La roue de la fortune, l'un des jeux les plus célèbres de l'histoire de la télévision française, fait son grand retour dans une version modernisée et renouvelée. La règle est simple : il faut deviner des mots et des expressions cachés, tout en tournant une roue géante pour remporter des gains et des cadeaux. Trois candidats s'affrontent à travers cinq manches. A la fin de la cinquième manche, celui ayant amassé le plus d'argent accède à la finale.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: La roue de la fortune, l'un des jeux les plus célèbres de l'histoire de la télévision française, fait son grand retour dans une version modernisée et renouvelée. La règle est simple : il faut deviner des mots et des expressions cachés, tout en tournant une roue géante pour remporter des gains et des cadeaux. programme.title: Tous en cuisine, en direct avec Cyril Lignac
programme.desc: Cyril Lignac s'invite chez vous pour vous faire redécouvrir le plaisir de cuisiner en famille. Place à la cuisine du week-end pour prendre le temps de mijoter de bons petits plats en famille, sans stress et avec beaucoup de plaisir. Au menu : blanquette, pot-au-feu, couscous ou ratatouille. Des plats généreux qui feront le bonheur des grandes tablées et réchaufferont les cœurs. Préparez-vous à un festival de saveurs avec des recettes conviviales et réconfortantes.

programme.title: Météo
programme.desc: Un bulletin détaillé et pédagogique, qui permet de connaître l'évolution de la météo au quotidien.

programme.title: Le 19.45

programme.title: Matlock - Saison 1
programme.desc: Madeline Matty Matlock, avocate retraitée, décide de reprendre sa carrière en rejoignant le prestigieux cabinet Jacobson Moore. Grâce à son approche discrète et à ses méthodes ingénieuses, elle parvient à prouver sa valeur. C'est ainsi qu'elle hérite du dossier d'un homme condamné à tort...

programme.title: Matlock - Saison 1
programme.desc: Matty commence un nouveau travail. Son équipe défend un adolescent souffrant d'un retard de développement qui est accusé de meurtre et dont la famille clame son innocence. Pendant ce temps, Olympia et Julian s'affrontent sur une question parentale. Ce drame juridique explore une affaire complexe et des dynamiques familiales...

programme.title: Matlock - Saison 1
programme.desc: Occupée à pirater les mails de sa patronne avec l'aide de son petit-fils Alfie, Matty va devoir mettre ses compétences d'avocate au service d'une femme qui accuse son ancien patron de harcèlement sexuel et de licenciement abusif. Shae Banfield, experte en constitution de jury, vient aider l'équipe.

programme.title: NCIS - Saison 21
programme.desc: Lorsque Maurice Riva, l'ex-compagnon violent de la mère de Nick Torres quand celui-ci était enfant, est abattu, Nick est arrêté par le FBI. Refusant d'être assisté par un avocat, l'agent du NCIS reconnaît le meurtre. Ses collègues, qui ne croient pas en sa culpabilité, cherchent à l'innocenter...

programme.title: NCIS - Saison 21
programme.desc: A son arrivée au domicile de Ducky pour l'aider sur une de ses enquêtes, Palmer le découvre mort dans son sommeil. Pour honorer la mémoire du légiste et historien du NCIS, l'équipe va reprendre cette enquête inachevée concernant un Marine dont la mort suspecte a entraîné son déshonneur militaire...

programme.title: NCIS - Saison 17
programme.desc: L'équipe a été très marquée par le passage éclair de Ziva. Chargée de procéder à l'évaluation psychologique des agents, Sloane les voit les uns après les autres. McGee pense que Bishop se sent écrasée par l'aura de Ziva. Bishop pense que Torres vit mal d'avoir été battu par Ziva. Gibbs et Slaone se rapprochent...

programme.title: NCIS - Saison 17
programme.desc: Un cheval sans cavalier arrive au galop dans le cimetière national d'Arlington. Une paire de bottes est attachée à ses étriers. Des pieds humains y sont retrouvés. Gibbs et son équipe découvrent rapidement l'identité de la victime. Il s'agit du sergent David Holztman, un vétéran sans-abri...

programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: After more than 30 years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete "Maverick" Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him. Training a detachment of graduates for a special assignment, Maverick must confront the ghosts of his past and his deepest fears, culminating in a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those who choose to fly it.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Top Gun Naval Fighter Weapons School is where the best of the best train to refine their elite flying skills. When hotshot fighter pilot Maverick (Tom Cruise) is sent to the school, his reckless attitude and cocky demeanor put him at odds with the other pilots, especially the cool and collected Iceman (Val Kilmer). But Maverick isn't only competing to be the top fighter pilot, he's also fighting for the attention of his beautiful flight instructor, Charlotte Blackwood (Kelly McGillis).

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: In Steven Spielberg's massive blockbuster, paleontologists Alan Grant (Sam Neill) and Ellie Sattler (Laura Dern) and mathematician Ian Malcolm (Jeff Goldblum) are among a select group chosen to tour an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA. While the park's mastermind, billionaire John Hammond (Richard Attenborough), assures everyone that the facility is safe, they find out otherwise when various ferocious predators break free and go on the hunt.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer sends his long-time expert, Phil Wills to lead the rescue of a bar in San Marcos, California that is suffering from an identity crisis.

programme.title: Inside Edition
programme.desc: A syndicated newsmagazine includes investigative reports, interviews with newsmakers, human interest stories, and celebrity and pop-culture features. The long-running series, which premiered in 1989, is currently anchored by Eva Pilgrim. Prior to Pilgrim taking the helm, the show was anchored by Deborah Norville and, earlier, by former Fox News mainstay Bill O'Reilly.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: Each episode gives viewers an inside look at television, film and music, including interviews with each industry's biggest stars. Over the years, many celebrities have "broken their silence" regarding various scandals or tragedies with hosts and correspondents from "ET." In addition to covering breaking news, the show visits sets of movies and TV shows and heads to the red carpet to cover awards shows and other major events. Airing daily since 1981, "Entertainment Tonight" is the template by which many other entertainment newsmagazines are based.

programme.desc: (2018) Tense thriller starring Rosslyn Luke. Happy to be reunited at first, a woman quickly realises her former best friend has sinister plans to hold her and her family hostage.

programme.title: Gone Daughter Gone
programme.desc: (2020) Suspenseful thriller starring Andrea Bogart. When her daughter is abducted, Shannon decides to take matters into her own hands, putting her on a collision course with a deadly kidnapper...

programme.title: Staged Killer
programme.desc: When a former co-host works his way back into the life of popular TV host Naomi Spencer, the show's success skyrockets, but Naomi's personal life begins to fall apart. Starring Chrishell Stause (2019)

programme.title: The Wedding Stalker
programme.desc: A dressmaker longs to have a wedding of her own with the man of her dreams. And she will stop at nothing to have it - even if it means killing his bride to be.

programme.title: The People's Vet
programme.desc: Meet the dedicated teams of vets and nurses who provide the essential care and treatment needed by their furry patients at two of the UK's busiest Charity pet hospitals.

programme.title: The People's Vet
programme.desc: Meet the dedicated teams of vets and nurses who provide the essential care and treatment needed by their furry patients at two of the UK's busiest Charity pet hospitals.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Blue Plague: Brainy Smurf has decided to dedicate himself to the wellbeing of his fellow Smurfs. He is going to cure them of all ills… With a little help from the evil Gargamel!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: Bringing Up Bigfeet
programme.desc: Remember Bigmouth, the ogre, and his lovely wife Bignose? They have a baby now: tiny (by ogre standards) Bigfeet. As the Smurflings Snappy, Slouchy and Nat, and of course the ever-willing Sassette are not entitled to baby-sit Baby Smurf, they volunteer to watch over Bigfeet, while its parents are at the Ogre Ball. The little Smurfs will get more than what they expected...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth Smurf: Plotting to rid himself of the Smurfs, Gargamel casts a spell over Bigmouth and disguises himself as a Smurf. Thinking he is a Smurf, Bigmouth nearly succeeds in wrecking everything in the Village of the Smurfs until Papa Smurf comes up with a cure.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sand Witch: A swamp monster kidnaps Baby as a gift for a witch. The witch, who thinks no one loves her, is amazed when Baby shows affection. When Papa comes to rescue Baby, he makes the witch understand that the loyal swamp monster has always loved her.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Love Those Smurfs: A wicked sorceress casts a spell on the Smurfs, forcing them to love themselves and not each other. Vanity, who's always like that, was away at the time, but notices the change when he returns. He breaks the spell by getting all the Smurfs to eat humble pie baked by a wizard.

programme.title: Revenge Of The Smurfs
programme.desc: A war is raging in the Middle Ages. Knights in armor in hot pursuit inadvertently destroy the Smurfs Village so a small band of Smurfs decide to avenge this wrongdoing. Won't Papa Smurf think this is too human-like a reaction?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Crying Smurfs: Everybody can make a mistake. Take Papa Smurf, for instance. His new perfume-enhancing spray makes a rose smell like a thousand roses...but due to a whole series of misadventures it also makes all the Smurfs cry, moved to tears by the slightest of pretexts. While they sob, bawl, wail moan and whimper, the evil wizard Gargamel does not stand still...

programme.title: Essence Of Brainy
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf is not the same anymore. He is polite, considerate, modest and calls every other Smurf Sir or Madame. All the Smurfs are worried that Brainy has lost all that makes his personality. They ought to be worried, for Brainy has been the victim of a system called an Essence Remover that Scruple, Gargamel's apprentice, uses... But Brainy's essence is coming back!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sir Hefty: Sir Hefty discovers a wayward knight to help him defeat a dragon whose fire is threatening to destroy the forest. Alas, the knight proves to be a coward, leaving Hefty to prove just how brave he is when he sends the dragon away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfs At Sea: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales, desert islands... and pirates!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby Smurf Is Missing: Thinking Baby Smurf is a leprechaun, two poachers kidnap him and try to get the small one to tell them where his pot of gold is hidden. Papa Smurf organizes everyone to attack the villains with Smurfberry pies so Baby can escape.

programme.title: Tailor's Magic Needle
programme.desc: Tailor Smurf has to make an outfit for every Smurf before the Fall fashion show. Brainy Smurf wants to help him and, using Papa Smurf's book of Magic, he conjures up a magic needle that sews ten times faster than tailor... But is it really any good?

programme.title: Return To Don Smurfo
programme.desc: When a drop of Papa Smurf's new potion spills on the Smurflings' adventure book, the fictional hero springs to life. The dashing Don Smurfo, willing to rid the Smurf of the evil Gargamel, gallantly captures him...

programme.title: The Smurfiest Of Friends
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf had one friend: Clumsy Smurf. But poor Clumsy is so, well, clumsy, that Brainy refuses to see him again. So now he is left without anyone willing to listen to him. Maybe Buddy, the good-looking imp met by chance near the Great Oak can be a pal for Brainy....

programme.title: Foul Weather Smurf
programme.desc: Handy invents a weather machine that will allow the Smurfs to control their environment at will. Unfortunately, they cannot agree on whether it should rain or be sunny so the machine overloads and explodes.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Laugh: Gargamel has found a new diabolical scheme to get rid of the Smurfs: a glittering powder that is going to reduce them to helpless laughter...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Scarlet Croaker: Greenpeedeepee Swamp is the only place you can find Swamp Root, the delicious and necessary ingredient of Greedy Smurf's famed swamp root stew. Unfortunately, it is also one place where you can find those hideous Wartmongers. Even though Sassette and the Smurfs save a young Wartmonger's life, they still end up being captured by the others. But the Scarlet Croaker will save them! Maybe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Circus For Baby: It must be a coincidence: just as an elephant crosses the forest and meets baby Smurf, the Smurfs decide to create a big Smurf Circus. They are going to meet the infernal sorcerer Balthazar and Baby Smurf will have a lot of fun...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Adventures Of Robin Smurf: The Smurfs' theatrical production of 'Robin Smurf' comes to life as the legendary hero is portrayed by a really good actor...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Slumber Party: Poor Lazy! All he wants is a good night's rest. But no, all the Smurfs throw a party for him and, what's more, he gets dragged into a silly argument about painting giant Bigmouth's toes a bright tangerine red... It's a long, sleepless night for poor Lazy Smurf!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Cloak: What is in the box that's been found by Jokey Smurf? A cloak belonging to Wizlow the Magician gnome. And what sort of cloak? Jokey learns that it's a cloak of invisibility. Whoever wears it has a great opportunity of playing practical jokes... And guess what havoc an invisible Jokey is able to wreak on the Village. Yet if Wizlow parted with the cloak, there must be a reason...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - April Smurf's Day: April Smurf's Day turns out to be not so funny when Gargamel dons a smurfberry bush disguise to capture the happy little Smurfs. Papa Smurf instructs Feathers to call the birds to attack the fake bush. After it is stripped, the captured Smurfs climb aboard Feathers and fly away.

programme.title: Poet's Writers' Block
programme.desc: The Smurfs want a poem written for each of them. The pressure overwhelms Poet, so he runs away seeking inspiration. The Wilybeast King captures Poet and forces him to write a poem to cheer up the King's daughter. Poet learns that motivation must come from the heart and cannot be forced.

programme.title: The Littlest Witch
programme.desc: On an errand to Witch Haven for Papa Smurf, the little blue creatures meet a tiny witch and teach her how to be good while at the same time cause another witch to lose her wicked powers for one year after she falls into the river.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The First Telesmurf
programme.desc: Papa Smurf pours a magic potion over the new Smurf-melon patch, which instantly grows and grows all over the village and forest. The Smurfs use the blossoms as a telephone, but before Gargamel can trace their voices, the flowers turn into melons and telesmurf is no more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Waste Not, Smurf Not: Growing, harvesting and preparing food takes up much of the Smurfs' time. Handy invents a machine that farms and processes food. But this wonderful invention has its drawbacks...

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sir Hefty: Sir Hefty discovers a wayward knight to help him defeat a dragon whose fire is threatening to destroy the forest. Alas, the knight proves to be a coward, leaving Hefty to prove just how brave he is when he sends the dragon away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Root Of Evil: If there is one thing that the evil sorceress Chlorhydris cannot abide, it is other people's happiness. The spectacle of the Smurfs' gentle and song-filled life gets Chlorhydsis' hackles up. She must destroy that tinkling laughter, smother those happy repartees... She plants the root of evil in the forest and soon, no Smurf is on speaking terms with another. Baby Smurf is the only one untouched...

programme.title: The Abominable Snowbeast
programme.desc: Brainy and his friends organize a journey to Ice Mountain to pick the rare snow flower for Papa Smurf. They meet a terrifying snow beast that befriends them, due to Smurfette's kindness, and helps them find the tiny flower.

programme.title: The Horn Of Plenty
programme.desc: Mother Nature always does her best, but this time she's gone wrong. Her wand gets the wrong results and she accidentally damages the Autumn harvest. Now the Smurfs and all the forest animals face a lean and hungry winter. The only place where the Smurfs could get food would be the Land of Plenty. But Gargamel steals the famed Horn of Plenty to lure the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magic Rattle: The Smurfs help a fairy queen outwit the evil fairy Fallon who tries to take away her son's magic rattle.

programme.title: Smurfing In Sign Language
programme.desc: The Smurfs meet a woodland elf, who teaches them sign language after Gargamel inflicts a no-speaking potion on them.

programme.title: Don Smurfo
programme.desc: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - April Smurf's Day: April Smurf's Day turns out to be not so funny when Gargamel dons a smurfberry bush disguise to capture the happy little Smurfs. Papa Smurf instructs Feathers to call the birds to attack the fake bush. After it is stripped, the captured Smurfs climb aboard Feathers and fly away.

programme.title: The Mr Smurf Contest
programme.desc: When Papa decides to throw a Harvest Moon ball, all the male Smurfs compete in a "Mr Smurf" contest for the honor of escorting Sassette. Gargamel sneaks into the contest after shrinking himself with blue dye, in the hope of capturing all the Smurfs when he returns to normal size. The Smurfs kick him out and Sassette lets Papa escort her.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Dark-Ness Monster: When Brainy loses his glasses, he drops things, runs into objects, and becomes just as helpless as Clumsy, who now has to read to Brainy and help him get around. This experience makes Brainy feel guilty for the way he always made fun of Clumsy. He treats him with more respect once he receives a new pair of glasses.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Hovel Is Not A Home: In his search for a grander hovel, Gargamel looks in the Great Book of Spells to conjure up a new home. But all of his spells backfire and that convinces him that there's no place like home!

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth's Friend: Gargamel and Balthazar command a giant robot to force King Gerard to hand over Clockwork Smurf. When the robot is about to destroy the castle, Clockwork's new, large, and awkward friend Bigmouth defeats the robot. Clockwork is hurt in the battle but Handy fixes him and implants a voice box so he can say "Hi"!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - For The Love Of Gargamel: Trying a new spell on the Smurfs backfires when Gargamel turns himself into stone. The Smurfs are delirious with joy. Their archenemy will make them suffer no more!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Unsound Smurf: In an effort to give Papa some quiet time, Brainy uses one of Papa's spells to create a magical sound barrier around the village. Papa cannot reverse the spell and sends the Smurflings, who are trapped outside the Village, to a noisemaker. Baby takes a bottle of sound from the noisemaker, which breaks the barrier.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Nightmare: Every time Lazy falls asleep, he is caught in the same recurrent nightmare: he is in the power of Morphio, an evil sorcerer who wants to capture as many sleeping souls as possible. One after another, all the Smurfs are going to fall in Morphio's clutches. All of them? Well, maybe not, if Papa Smurf can help it. And Papa Smurf goes to the Sandman for help...

programme.desc: Meet a lively and mischievous little girl named Masha and her best friend the Bear!

programme.title: Molly And Lawless John
programme.desc: In New Mexico, a sheriff's unhappy mid-aged wife aids a condemned prisoner escape her husband's jail and elopes with the young and attractive outlaw to Mexico, pursued by the sheriff's posse.

programme.title: Keoma
programme.desc: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.

programme.title: Django Meets Sartana
programme.desc: The small desert town of Black City is held in a reign of terror by a nasty gang of criminals lead by the ruthless Bud Willer.

programme.title: Five Guns West
programme.desc: Shalee Jethro (Dorothy Malone) helps her father run a desert stagecoach station.

programme.title: The Daring Caballero
programme.desc: Cisco learns that Pappy Del Rio, the town's leading citizen, is set to be hanged for murder. The Padre believes Pappy is innocent, so Cisco breaks him out and hides him. While on the run, Cisco encounters the Mayor, an outlaw he knows under a new name, and suspects he's the real murderer. Cisco sets out to prove the Mayor's guilt and clear Pappy's name.

programme.title: Gunfight at Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging outsider riddles a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: When a sudden spurt of murders occurs in Texas Big Bend country, suspicion immediately falls on a young drifter who just moved to the area.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Colorized American Western Movie from 1946 starring Randolph Scott: Abilene Town - A sheriff tries to stop homesteader conflicts in the West after the Civil War.

programme.title: Dynamite Jim
programme.desc: Union soldiers must transport Mexican gold across dangerous terrain—but greedy outlaws, a corrupt banker, and the explosive outlaw Dynamite Jim are hot on their trail. What begins as a mission of duty turns into a high-stakes showdown filled with ambushes, betrayals, and blazing gunfights.

programme.title: Day of Anger
programme.desc: Bank robbery pulled off by the bank officials, not the usual James gang.

programme.title: Man, Pride & Vengeance
programme.desc: A stalwart Spanish soldier turns to a life of crime to prove his love for a mysterious and promiscuous gypsy woman.

programme.title: Long Days of Hate
programme.desc: A bounty, Benson is hunting down a vicious outlaw gang, who killed his parents, brother and sisters, except for one sister, Susy, who he wants for himself!

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
programme.desc: Sartana, a bounty hunter and gunfighter, witnesses a gold robbery and arrives in a suspicious town run by Samuel Spencer. Hired to protect the next shipment, Sartana fends off numerous incompetent villains, surviving their attempts on his life. Meanwhile, his nemesis, Sabbath—known for his white coat and parasol—arrives in town. With tensions rising, Sartana and Sabbath are headed for a final showdown to settle the score.
