programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics' and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics' and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished. Trying to help some teenagers, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now David's in big debt to his supplier, and to wipe the slate clean, he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: he packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and he'll finally get to be the rock star he knows he's destined to be.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unravelling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys'. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each other's throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindler's efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleone's 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: When an ex-cop is told that four androids, known as replicants, who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan have illegally fled back to Earth, he sets out on the trail to terminate them.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his family's interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the family's seamier dealings. His descent accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: When an ex-cop is told that four androids, known as replicants, who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan have illegally fled back to Earth, he sets out on the trail to terminate them.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay and Jay are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel. Based on the book by Stephen King.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter, and a servant, forcing them to seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how it was committed.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower man's mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers who's doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesn't download in 24 hours, he'll die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after what's in his head.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay and Jay are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome' to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster `Trap'.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone' in the first `Superman' movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helplessly.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kent's class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielberg's 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.desc: Husband and wife architects Gaurav and Vish design a multigenerational home for their ageing parents and young children, entirely clad in over 9000 terracotta tiles.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 63-year-old builder has fallen from a height. While his daughter tells of her dad's many sacrifices, a teenager who's been hit by a car arrives with possible brain injuries.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: John has a suspected aneurysm, Jamie's motorbike has collided with a car on a motorway slip road and carpenter Noel has partially amputated his thumb using a bandsaw at work.

programme.title: Perfect Pub Walks with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: This time, Xander takes Sir Lenny Henry on three pub walks in the Shropshire countryside. Together they hunt for fossils, make their own works of art, have a sing-song and learn about ideas born in this quiet, green corner of England.

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: In Yorkshire, Neil needs urgent attention after a fall from his motorbike. The medics head to the banks of Ullswater when a walker goes into a cardiac arrest. In Berkshire, Darran suffers nasty burns in an accident lighting a bonfire.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Andalucía, it's launch day at a couple's new hotel, in south west France, two gîte owners from Nottinghamshire are dealt a financial blow, and in Italy, an injury puts a group of organic farmers under strain.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A B&B owner swaps Brighton for the Costa Del Sol, stormy weather halts a Nottinghamshire couple's gîte renovations in France, and a new idea gets off to a bumpy start on an organic farm in Italy.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Stephanie's running out of time to build a gazebo for her mum's birthday party. Janet and Philip face a plaster disaster as they struggle to get the salon renovated. And Trish must nail down over 100 decking boards in time for a pool party.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Anna and Edward juggle guest turnovers in their plight to get the chateau wedding-ready. Janet and Philip bring the ceiling down in their ambitious room renovation. And Abbie and Clive transform an old outbuilding into a new living quarter for Abbie.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts in Maldon, Essex and The White Horse Inn, where hospitality expert Jayne and her husband, Pete Kocinoga, hope their attention to detail will win over their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Barnfield B&B in St Osyth, Essex, run by Christine and her toy boy husband Paul Harman. Here, as well as offering rooms, Christine also runs spiritual retreats.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit the group head to The Black Swan Inn in Pickering, Yorkshire, where Phil and Jill have spent large sums to bring their 18th century inn up to their exacting standards.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to Delamere Farm in Northborough, where owner Agi Chapman, who is joined by Jayne Thorpe Godman, prides herself on providing a luxurious sleep to all her visitors.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It is the final day of the competition and the owners are meeting for the last time. After bitter rebukes and tears, the payments are revealed before the winner is finally announced.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz head to Lincolnshire where the embodiment of a once luxurious era awaits - a 1929 Rolls Royce Doctor's Coupe.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz head to Norfolk where a sporty French hot hatch awaits. The car belongs to student Senna, who comes from a family of petrol heads.

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.desc: With life a bit quieter than normal, Dick and Angel throw a Great British garden party for Arthur and Dorothy's friends, and work finally starts on re-slating the chateau roof for the first time in 150 years.

programme.title: The Dog House Australia
programme.desc: Dog walker Amy meets Chihuahua cross Angel. And the Harmey family - who recently lost their adored retriever - are overjoyed to meet Tala the groodle.

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: The unstoppable Tilburn girls and their dad James meet Papaya. Yvonne and Graham think their sausage dog Baxter needs a buddy and have their eyes on fellow sausage Tinkerbell. And Tom and Adele want a dog to get them out walking after a health scare.

programme.title: Great Estates from Above [NEW]
programme.desc: Explores the 10,000-acre Castle Howard Estate in Yorkshire as it races to complete a massive renovation ahead of its spring opening to the public. The Howard family and their team of staff and volunteers work to transform the historic interiors.

programme.title: Red Sparrow
programme.desc: Prima ballerina Dominika Egorova faces a bleak and uncertain future after she suffers an injury that ends her career. She soon turns to Sparrow School, a secret intelligence service that trains exceptional young people to use their minds and bodies as weapons, and she emerges as the most dangerous Sparrow after completing the sadistic training process. As she comes to terms with her new abilities, Dominika meets a CIA agent who tries to convince her that he is the only person she can trust.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Paul has transverse myelitis and may have suffered a stroke. Josh broke his leg playing American football. Eric's come to A&E feeling dizzy, with his granddaughter by his side.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Natai is rushed to A&E with a lacerated wrist after putting his hand through a glass pane. Pauline is struggling to breathe. And, 17-year-old Fahad has crippling stomach pain.

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: In Cambridgeshire, the heli-medics race to treat a cyclist with a time-critical brain injury. On the Norfolk Broads, Tom breaks his thigh bone jumping off a boat. Cedric, an 87-year-old pilot, is put into an induced coma.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: On the Costa del Sol, there are build problems at some holiday lets. Organic farmers in Italy launch a new venture, a hotelier in Tarifa in Spain plans his first wedding, and two gîte owners in France get creative.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: An enterprising family take over a bar on the Costa del Sol, a Hampshire couple move to Bergerac to restore a 100-year-old house, and a building in Valencia is made habitable for new guests.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: It's a balancing act for Janet and Philip as their room renovation starts to wobble. In the Dordogne, Clive finds cracks in his handywork as a septic tank starts to flood. And Tim's nose is out of joint when an accident leaves him in hospital.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Abbie gets her hands dirty upcycling a kitchen. Janet and Philip battle the elements to put on a special dinner party. And in the Charente-Maritime, Bart and Sarah get the keys to their chateau and begin living the French dream.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts at the Hillcroft in Torquay, where husband and wife team Martyn and Elaine Flint hope their lovingly decorated adults-only B&B will prove a hit with their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit sees Sam and Henry confident that their five-star rooms above a quintessential English country pub, The Bear and Swan, in Chew Magna, Somerset, will impress their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit is to the Guesthouse East in Eastbourne, where childhood sweethearts Tony and Lisa hope their guests will fall head over heels for their family friendly B&B.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to the Shirley B&B in Bournemouth, where Jorge Mesquita hopes to impress his guests with his all-round cleanliness and the power of his showers.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's the final day of the competition and the B&B owners meet for the last time. The Hillcroft kicks things off and hosts Martyn and Elaine want answers from both Tony and Lisa and Sam and Henry.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are picking up one of France's most legendary rally racers - a 1972 Renault Alpine 110. The car belongs to former restaurateur Guido.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are off to Manchester to pick up everyone's favourite commercial vehicle - a 1978 Bedford HA Ice Cream Van.

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.desc: Dick and Angel renovate the orangery. The roof is 100 years old and needs to be replaced. Together with Angel's parents, they also work on the outer walls and the terrace.

programme.title: The Dog House Australia
programme.desc: Flatmates Greg and Allan hope that a Staffie called Betty can become their third flatmate. And Jason falls for husky Lara, but is the feeling mutual?

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Harry needs a new friend to play fetch, and Ollie the spaniel is the ideal match. Sassy fluffball Balloo causes a stir. And can blind cockapoo Marnie take guidance from Bella the stray?

programme.title: The Wall - The Orchard [NEW]
programme.desc: Céline finds out that Véronique had a confessor at the Abbey, while Alex learns that the monks sold the orchard to Marie-Thérèse Jolicoeur for a pittance in the 1950s - but why? And the discovery of another body adds to the messy mix.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A cyclist is rushed to hospital with head trauma after he's hit by a car. A 92-year-old falls when out walking near his home, and an injured painter-decorator talks about being a dad.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A man is wheeled in after his neurological disorder causes a serious complication. A car crash patient must overcome the trauma and embark on a journey to recovery.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics help a man who's collapsed and may be having a heart attack. Police find a man lying unconscious in the street following a suspected overdose. And an elderly woman climbs on a chair to reach a daddy long-legs, with painful consequences.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A cyclist is rushed to hospital with head trauma after he's hit by a car. A 92-year-old falls when out walking near his home, and an injured painter-decorator talks about being a dad.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A man is wheeled in after his neurological disorder causes a serious complication. A car crash patient must overcome the trauma and embark on a journey to recovery.

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Matt discovers what gives clotted cream its yellow colour, Jimmy learns where the flavour comes from in his Earl Grey tea, and Kate finds out if oysters can be eaten all year round.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts in Huddersfield, where John Whitworth hopes the unique style of The Edge Accommodation has enough personality to win over his guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Darwin Lake Holiday Village in Matlock, managed by best friends Sally McAnulty and Teresa Shirley, who take pride in their exclusive village feel.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit, the group head to Sands Resort Hotel and Spa in Newquay, where father-and-son team Nicholas and Tom Malcolm pride themselves on the vast facilities they have on offer.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to Oak Tree Lane Yurt Site in Bratton Clovelly, Devon, where owner Phil Gilbert is taking things back to basics. On arrival, the guests are wowed by the Mongolian yurts.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's the final day of the competition and the B&B owners are meeting for the last time. The Edge Accommodation is first and host John wants to shut the door on some criticism.

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George and Will Hardie meet the daughter of a survivor of a World War II Japanese prisoner of war camp and uncovers an immaculately illustrated guide to building a 1930s caravan, painstakingly created by her dad while held in captivity.

programme.title: Ugly House to Lovely House with George Clarke
programme.desc: Sue and Simon believe that their Hertfordshire house is the ugliest on their street. Architect Laura Jane Clark specialises in breathing new life into unlovely spaces, but Sue and Simon have a tight budget of just £50,000.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George is in Manchester to drag an Arts and Crafts-inspired Edwardian home kicking and screaming into the modern day. And in London he meets Flo, a first-time buyer whose 1930s flat needs a rejig to make it the sociable space she's longing for.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help Brett and Jo, and Ben and Pip come to terms with the competitive property scene in Nottingham, where trendy homes in the right spot are scarce.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The competition is in and around Newcastle, with first host is 32-year-old ballroom dance instructor Stuart. Stuart is hoping to dazzle his guests with his rainbow themed night, and a colourful but healthy menu.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the second night from in and around Newcastle, and the turn of Geordie geezer Adam to host. Adam has got it all to do and he is opting for fine dining and upmarket gastropub food to try and wow his guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is day three in Newcastle and horse obsessed, nursing student Harriet is throwing a dinner party entirely themed around her equestrian hobby. However, she has got plenty of surprises in store for her guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is day four in Newcastle and videographer Jude is hoping to win over her carnivorous guests with a decidedly experimental vegetarian menu. However, there is a distinct lack of vegetables.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final night from in and around Newcastle, and it is the turn of Mo to host. After two nights with no voice, Mo is back on form with a menu of traditional South African dishes which he hopes will win him the prize.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at Tay House in Dunkeld, where Mike and Kat are hoping that their guests will find a home from home in their traditional Scottish hotel. But the B&Bers don't find the lack of TVs in their rooms particularly homely.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Visit two is to the Aberlour Hotel in Moray, run by Kellie and Alison. A trip to a local whisky distillery gets everyone into the spirit of things, and breakfast gets a flawless reception. But cleanliness comments leave a hangover at feedback time.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Visit three is to Cobblehouse Country Cabins in Aberdeenshire, where Graham and Emma hope their guests will be pining for more of their relaxing self-catering cabins. The B&Bers are wowed by the wood, but one pair think it's all a bit old-fashioned.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to Trinity Boutique B&B in Peterhead in Aberdeenshire. Host Yuliya treats her guests to an afternoon in a prison, before wowing her guests with a breakfast that's considerably more substantial than porridge.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's payment day, and the holiday hosts meet for one last time to find out how much they've been paid and settle some scores. After cutting questions, cleanliness concerns and a Moroccan mismatch, the B&Bers find out who's won the week.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Iris, who's 91, comes to St George's with two severe leg fractures, and medics are worried that she may not survive. Elijah has injured a finger on a kebab slicer, and Alison has sepsis.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: The paramedics help a child who's having a severe asthma attack, a young woman who has multiple sclerosis and is in considerable pain and a man with advanced bowel cancer who's struggling to breathe.

programme.desc: Heli-medics race to a skydiver suffering serious injuries after smashing into a house. And, there's a race to reach a man who has fallen 40 feet from a ladder. Biker Hanna is trapped with multiple injuries after she ploughs into a road sign.

programme.title: Les douze coups de midi
programme.desc: E51 Tout au long de la semaine, les candidats qui rivalisent pour devenir "Maître de midi", permettent également à l'association ELA (Association Européenne contre les Leucodystrophies) de récolter 5000 € par bonne réponse. Le dimanche 19 octobre, Jean-Luc Reichmann remettra à la présidente de l'association, Crystelle Cottard, un chèque correspondant au montant total collecté.

programme.title: Météo
programme.desc: Prévisions météorologiques en France par le service de TF1.

programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: L'enquête avance, les policiers ont un nouveau suspect ! Reste à savoir où il se cache. De son côté, Baptiste a bien du mal à conjuguer sa vie de famille avec sa vie professionnelle. Louis, quant à lui, se confie à Djawad sur les joies de la colocation..

programme.title: La grande course de Noël
programme.desc: Avery, enseignante, et Wes, hockeyeur star retraité, prennent le départ de la grande course de Noël avec des objectifs diamétralement opposés. Les deux vont pourtant s'apercevoir que leurs différences font d'eux une équipe du tonnerre, et pourraient leur permettre de remporter la course, et peut-être plus encore..

programme.title: La grande course de Noël
programme.desc: Alors qu'ils prennent ensemble le départ d'une course de Noël, une jeune femme et son partenaire, tous deux célibataires, se découvrent de surprenants atomes crochus.

programme.title: L'île merveilleuse de Noël
programme.desc: Kate, célibataire endurcie, est pilote de ligne. Pour changer de la routine de son quotidien, elle postule pour devenir pilote d'un jet privé. Son entretien d'embauche se passe bien, et elle se voit immédiatement proposer un premier vol pour la Suisse. Mais ce premier vol ne se passe pas comme prévu..

programme.title: Tout pour la lumière
programme.desc: Entre Swann et Noah, la tension monte crescendo. Pour le dernier concert des élèves, place à l'impro ! A la coloc, Jacob ouvre son coeur.

programme.title: Ici tout commence
programme.desc: A l'Institut, Carla lâche une bombe. A l'Atelier, Tom fait un retour aux sources. De son côté, Bianca mise sur le mauvais cheval.

programme.title: Ici tout commence
programme.desc: Dans sa cuisine, Carla force la dose. A la cave, Maya force le destin. En cours, Jasmine se heurte à un mur.

programme.title: Ici tout commence
programme.desc: S6 E1283 A l'Institut, Carla lâche une bombe. A l'Atelier, Tom fait un retour aux sources. De son côté, Bianca mise sur le mauvais cheval.

programme.title: Demain nous appartient
programme.desc: Bart entre chez Laurie par effraction. Samuel fait enfin sa proposition à Marine. L'espoir renait chez Violette quand Jordan lui donne rendez-vous.

programme.title: Météo
programme.desc: Prévisions météorologiques en France par le service de TF1.

programme.title: JT 20h
programme.desc: Le journal télévisé présente les faits marquants et les événements essentiels de l'actualité nationale et internationale, tout en mettant en valeur l'actualité régionale.

programme.title: My Million
programme.desc: Au menu, les derniers résultats d'EuroMillions ainsi que les codes gagnants My Million, avec les 5 numéros gagnants et les 2 bonnes étoiles de la loterie.

programme.title: Petits plats en équilibre
programme.desc: Laurent Mariotte donne toutes les astuces pour préparer de bons petits plats, comme un vrai chef, avec des ingrédients frais et de saison.

programme.title: Météo
programme.desc: Prévisions météorologiques en France par le service de TF1.

programme.title: S.W.A.T
programme.desc: Tan apprend que sa petite amie a été kidnappée. Après une brève enquête, l'équipe se lance à la poursuite du chef de cartel soupçonné d'être à l'origine de l'enlèvement.

programme.title: Petits plats en équilibre
programme.desc: Chaque jour, Laurent Mariotte propose des recettes simples et savoureuses pour profiter des ingrédients de saison, en donnant la part belle aux produits locaux.

programme.title: S.W.A.T
programme.desc: Plusieurs fusillades survenues dans des cliniques réservées aux femmes intriguent les membres de l'équipe, qui s'interrogent sur les dessous de ces mystérieuses attaques. Hondo et ses collègues décident de mener l'enquête et se demander si ces agressions n'ont pas été motivées par des considérations politiques..

programme.title: S.W.A.T.2017
programme.desc: S8 E5 La vengeance du boucher Tan apprend que sa petite amie a été kidnappée. Après une brève enquête, l'équipe se lance à la poursuite du chef de cartel soupçonné d'être à l'origine de l'enlèvement.

programme.title: S.W.A.T
programme.desc: Hicks souhaite que le Swat s'engage plus activement auprès de la population et demande à l'équipe de patrouiller dans Los Angeles lors d'un jour de fête, comme les autres agents de terrain. Hondo et Deacon se démènent pour encadrer les nouveaux membres de l'équipe. Pendant ce temps, Tan, suspendu, démarre une enquête à côté de chez lui..

programme.title: S.W.A.T
programme.desc: Dans un débit de boisson, une jeune femme sans papiers est enlevée par un gang ultra-violent venant du Honduras. L'équipe du S.W.A.T. doit la retrouver avant qu'elle ne soit contrainte de quitter le pays. La confiance suscitée par Luca permet d'identifier la victime. Par ailleurs, Hondo décide de présenter Nichelle à sa mère. Celle-ci lui demande sans détour si elle souhaite avoir des enfants..

programme.title: S.W.A.T
programme.desc: L'équipe du SWAT s'efforce d'arrêter un tireur qui s'en prend à des centres de soins pour toxicomanes, qu'il considère comme responsables de la mort de son frère. Deacon, de son côté, est surpris lorsque son épouse prend une décision qui a des conséquences inattendues pour leur fille..

programme.title: Tirage de l'EuroMillions
programme.desc: Consultez les derniers résultats d'EuroMillions ainsi que les codes gagnants My Million. Tous les mardi et vendredi, Elsa fayer ou Karine Ferri vous présentent les résultats des tirages officiels de My Million vers 20h50 puis EuroMillions vers 21h50. Découvrez les 5 numéros gagnants et les 2 bonnes étoiles d'EuroMillions mais aussi les codes gagnants My Million des derniers tirages.

programme.title: S.W.A.T
programme.desc: Hondo et son équipe sont appelés sur un chantier où a lieu une prise d'otage mais à leur arrivée, les quatre ravisseurs s'enfuient. Sur une vidéo, le commandant Hicks reconnaît Miguel Fuentes, le fils d'une famille dont l'expropriation a donné lieu trois ans plus tôt à une intervention du S.W.A.T..

programme.title: Programmes de nuit - TF1
programme.desc: Programmes de nuit.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young female member of a new age cult called The Oblong Foundation goes missing, DCI John Barnaby investigates and sends DS Jones undercover at the cult's base, Malham Hall. The police learn that the hall's previous owners, the Lamberts, died in a gas explosion on board their boat. Barnaby and Jones must try to find out what really happened to the Lamberts - and whether the case has a link to the missing woman.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a farmer is found horribly murdered in the middle of a stone circle, suspicion points at a group of druids. DCI John Barnaby and DS Jones hurry to the scene of the crime, where they are joined by new pathologist Kate Wilding on her first assignment. Druid high priest Leticia Clifford shows Barnaby that sacred ley lines run through the stone circle and later is convinced she has made an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are sampling the local cider at Midsomer Abbas spring fair when the body of a missing tax inspector is found floating in the cider vat. Meanwhile, publican Samuel Quested says that he wants to restore an ancient rite called the Stag in which men go in search of women from another village in order to 'refresh the gene pool'. As Barnaby and Jones investigate the murder they uncover an array of motives.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones enter the cloistered and old-fashioned world of Midsomer Priory after a nun is found strangled. Jones visits the local pub, where he learns that a woman was seen acting strangely on the day of the murder, and that teenagers in the area sneak into the priory grounds for romantic liaisons. Later, the nuns discover that a valuable silver altar set has vanished, then the chaplain is found murdered.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A row between keen birdwatchers in Midsomer-in-the-Marsh turns nasty when their president is killed. Patrick Morgan met his death while hoping to sight a rare bird, but is his obsession with ornithology to blame - or something more sinister? Barnaby and Jones attempt to discover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The peace of idyllic Badger's Drift is shattered by an inexplicable murder. It falls to DCI Barnaby and Sergeant Troy to hunt down the killer. Their investigation uncovers a web of sinister events, some long buried in the past.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the tranquil village of Midsomer Worthy, the local writers' circle is eagerly anticipating a visit from a best-selling novelist, but the aspiring authors are about to witness a sequence of gruesome events far stranger than any fiction.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the quiet rural village of Ferne Basset, an elderly resident is found drowned after a violent attack. Meanwhile, a local amateur dramatic production of `Amadeus' reveals a hitherto unseen world of intrigue and passion.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The village of Morton Fendle seems to be overflowing with community spirit when many of the residents invest in the local craft centre, but DCI Barnaby is called in after the wife of the centre's owner goes missing and a neighbour is murdered.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Barnaby is called in following the death of a cult leader and finds clues that point to a ruthless tycoon searching for his daughter.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a family decide to turn Midsomer Deverell's Memorial Garden into a tea shop they dig up more than just the animosity of local villagers. Warring families, illegitimacy, sexual liaisons and a potent home brew confront Detective Chief Inspector Tom Barnaby as he investigates murder in the garden.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the Naughty Pig. Dipsy's hat keeps blowing away and he has to chase it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa run into Home Hill to say 'Eh-oh', but where 's Po? Some children help their dad to wash his car. They get very wet and soapy.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies crawl through the arch in Home Hill and watch Alex Pascall and some children sing 'Handy Hands'.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children play with balls of different shapes and sizes. In Teletubbyland, something happens to Dipsy's hat.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number two. Dipsy and Laa-Laa are eating Tubby Toast. They play the game 'Two Little Teletubbies', but while they are playing the Noo-Noo tidies up their Tubby Toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies take turns to stand on a hill, in front of the house, next to a tree under a cloud. Andy Brown and some children visit some giraffes. The animals march through Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are eating Tubby Toast. They stop to watch Amy making pasta. A ball of string appears in Teletubbyland. Po knocks the string in to the air with her scooter and it makes a stringy mess all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky calls the other Tubbies to come and watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story about the naughty sock. The Tubby Toast machine makes a tower of tubby toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play 'Boo', but stop to watch Ned help his dad plant and water some geraniums. In Teletubbyland, nine pretty flowers and a watering can appear.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies love playing on the slide. They stop to watch Andy Brown and some children digging in the sand for crabs.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Samira and her friends show the Teletubbies their gymnastic routines. The Teletubbies do their own gymnastics.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Matthew and James help their uncle milk the cows. In Teletubbyland, the Tubby Custard machine isn't working, so they sing a special 'Tubby Custard' song. Then, the Tubby Custard machine works again.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies watch a little boy peel and mash some eggs for an egg mayonnaise sandwich. The Teletubbies laugh when they make a tune whilst eating their Tubby Custard.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance around the trees and watch some children drum with their friend Norris. Tinky Winky dance on the roof of Home Hill and wakes up the other Tubbies.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Dipsy says "Eh-oh" and runs off to find the other Tubbies. They watch some children make fantastic animals from papermache.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky says "Eh-oh". The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be the Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty hat. The Teletubbies are very happy when they find their favourite things to play with.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: In Teletubbyland, the Tubbies are trying to be quiet. They watch Oscar read the story of the Gingerbread Boy to his brother Felix. A voice trumpet appears and sings the nursery rhyme.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po fetches the other to watch Andy Brown and two children look for some rabbits. In Teletubbyland, Tinky Winky is looking for Po. He looks for her everywhere, but she is hiding from him. When he finds her all the Tubbies dance a happy dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance an up and down dance. They watch some children painting pictures and patterns on to eggs. In Teletubbyland, Laa-Laa dances with her ball until the magical tree appears.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch a little boy show us how to make a Turban. The Tubbies go for a walk, but Po, Laa-Laa and Dipsy want to play with their favourite things.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises and teaches the Teletubbies a nursery rhyme. Then they watch Becky go for a ride on a Tram. Po rides her scooter too fast and knocks the other Tubbies over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies watch some children are playing football in the park. Laa-Laa and Po love playing with the ball. While they play they sing a song about the ball.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies pop up from behind a hill to watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty sausage. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po go for a walk, so Laa-Laa decides to dance a secret dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number three. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa go for a walk. They count three trees and three flowers and Po follows behind counting too.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are asleep when a voice trumpet appears singing the rhyme 'Frére Jacques'. The Teletubbies laugh and call "Again, again!"

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies see a little girl and her brother who love salad. They go shopping in a market a market with their grandma to buy some salad to eat.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch two boys make Chinese Lanterns with their uncle. In Teletubbyland, it is time for Tubby Toast, but where has Laa-Laa's toast gone?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children learn about the colour blue. In Teletubbyland Po is watching the blue sky when it begins to rain.

programme.desc: Noo-Noo tidies up Home hill before the Teletubbies slide up the slide to watch Natalie tell us about her brother's christening.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Author and evangelist Joel Osteen spreads his message of love and hope as he preaches at the 30,000-plus member Lakewood Church in Houston. The program can be seen in more than 100 countries. Osteen urges people to live at their full potential and form a close relationship with God.

programme.title: Kingdom Connection With Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: Pastor Jentezen Franklin brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in the Word of God.

programme.title: VeggieTales
programme.desc: Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber are an unlikely duo in a world of talking vegetables. The two friends learn about honesty, kindness, and forgiveness together -- and Larry always has a silly song to sing. Another main character on the show is 5-year-old Junior Asparagus.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Author and evangelist Joel Osteen spreads his message of love and hope as he preaches at the 30,000-plus member Lakewood Church in Houston. The program can be seen in more than 100 countries. Osteen urges people to live at their full potential and form a close relationship with God.

programme.title: Allen Jackson Ministries
programme.desc: What's the best way to prepare for the uncertain future? Trust God with our resources! Pastor Allen Jackson talks about biblical principles surrounding the money, resources, and possessions.

programme.title: Steven Furtick
programme.desc: From Elevation Church in Charlotte, N.C., Pastor Steven Furtick offers inspirational messages through his sermons.

programme.title: Kingdom Connection With Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: Pastor Jentezen Franklin brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in the Word of God.

programme.title: Robert Jeffress
programme.desc: The teaching ministry of American Southern Baptist, pastor and television host, Robert Jeffress; he is a senior minister of the first Baptist Church in Dallas as well as a Fox News contributor.

programme.title: Vinia
programme.desc: Governor Huckabee interviews soldiers and veterans who use VINIA, a red grape supplement for circulation; viewers hear how VINIA helps their physical strength and mental alertness.

programme.title: Praise
programme.desc: Matt and Laurie sit down with Jentezen Franklin to discuss the global impact of TBN.

programme.title: Elmer Heinrich: Boosting Health with Immuno 150
Jim Scudder, Jr.: InGrace
programme.desc: A religious leader elaborates on the teachings of the Almighty and encourages followers to follow the path of spirituality.

programme.title: Touching Lives With James Merritt
programme.desc: Dr. James Merritt desires to make the name of Jesus Christ known as well as to help empower Christians in their daily walk with God; Dr. Merritt's purpose remains to bring the lost to a personal encounter with Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Turning Point With Dr. David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: Having purpose in one's life.

programme.title: BillyGraham.TV
programme.desc: Stories from those who survived the devastation of Hurricane Helene; what really matters when we face the storms of life.

programme.title: Praise
programme.desc: Matt and Laurie Crouch sit down with Ed Rush to discuss his new book, "God Talks: Even If You've Made A Million Mistakes"; Ed shares personal stories of faith, redemption, and the ways God speaks to us even through our failures.

programme.title: Drive Thru American History
programme.desc: Examine the life and vision of the enterprising William Penn. At his home, Pennsbury Manor, learn about Penn's philosophy of representative government; visit Christ Church in Philadelphia, the parish of many Founding Fathers; the first American flag.

programme.title: Your Move With Andy Stanley
programme.desc: Author Andy Stanley helps the viewer to make better decisions and live with fewer regrets.

programme.title: The Mating Game
programme.desc: An Internal Revenue Service agent (Tony Randall) audits an evasive farmer (Paul Douglas) and woos his elusive daughter (Debbie Reynolds).

programme.title: Buffaloed
programme.desc: A woman is desperate to escape her life in Buffalo and finds a way by becoming a debt collector.

programme.title: Ben Hur
programme.desc: An enslaved Judean prince (Charlton Heston) meets his Roman betrayer (Stephen Boyd), a former friend, in a chariot race.

programme.title: The Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Sir Gawain meets the Green Knight, Sir Percival seeks the Holy Grail, and King Arthur's (Mel Ferrer) Guinevere (Ava Gardner) loves Sir Lancelot (Robert Taylor).

programme.title: T-34
programme.desc: In 1944, a young lieutenant leads a group of Russian soldiers in a German POW camp and plots a daring escape from captivity in a half-destroyed T-34 tank.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A rancher's son (Robert Walker) gets his foster brother (Burt Lancaster) in trouble with an unwed mother's brothers.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: The March sisters -- Meg (Janet Leigh), Jo (June Allyson), Beth (Margaret O'Brien) and Amy (Elizabeth Taylor) -- struggle to make ends meet in their New England household while their father is away fighting in the Civil War. Despite harsh times, they cling to optimism, often with neighbor Laurie (Peter Lawford) as a companion. As they mature, they face burgeoning ambitions and relationships, as well as tragedy, all the while maintaining their unbreakable bond.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong police hunt for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the police recruit artist Lee Man.

programme.title: The Last Shift
programme.desc: Calling it quits after 38 years, an aging fast-food worker trains his young replacement on the graveyard shift at Oscar's Chicken and Fish.

programme.title: Dracula Has Risen From the Grave
programme.desc: The vampire count (Christopher Lee) bites a tavern waitress and a monsignor's (Rupert Davies) niece (Veronica Carlson), then falls on something sharp.
