programme.title: Live: 2025 FIFA U-20 World Cup
programme.desc: From the Elias Figueroa Brander Stadium in Valparaiso, Chile.

programme.title: UEFA Nations League Soccer
programme.desc: Spain and Portugal face each other from Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany. Both teams seek to win the tournament for a second time with Portugal winning in 2019 and Spain winning in 2023.

programme.title: Live: 2025 FIFA U-20 World Cup
programme.desc: From Julio Martinez Pradanos National Stadium in Santiago, Chile.

programme.title: Extreme H Championship Highlights
programme.desc: FIA Extreme H World Cup represents a bold, pioneering step forward in the transition to clean energy, showcasing cutting-edge hydrogen technology in a competitive racing environment.

programme.title: Extreme E Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Extreme E Championships for electric cars.

programme.title: NHRA in 30
programme.desc: In the fastest motorsport on earth, things don't always go as planned; relive the explosive moments from the 2024 season that grabbed our attention and our hearts, and see how They Walked Away.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Wildcats host the Horned Frogs. Kansas State beat TCU 31-28 in overtime in the 2022 Big 12 title game, and won 41-3 during the last meeting in 2023. TCU quarterback Josh Hoover is among the nation's leaders with 15 touchdown passes in 2025.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Nittany Lions (3-2, 0-2 Big Ten) welcome the Wildcats (3-2, 1-1) to Happy Valley. Penn State fell out of the AP Top 25 after two straight losses, the last a shocking 42-37 defeat to UCLA at the Rose Bowl. Northwestern beat UCLA 17-14 in Week 5.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 1 Buckeyes go up against the No. 17 Fighting Illini. Ohio State is off to a 14th consecutive 2-0 start in Big Ten play, and a fourth straight 5-0 start overall after trouncing Minnesota 42-3 on Oct. 4. OSU boasts the nation's top defense.

programme.title: The American Rodeo
programme.desc: From Globe Life Field in Arlington, TX.

programme.title: The American Rodeo
programme.desc: From Arlington, Texas.

programme.title: The American Performance Horseman
programme.desc: From Dickies Arena in Fort Worth, Texas.

programme.title: Rodeo
programme.desc: The best moments from The Governor's Cup Pro Rodeo, where top cowboys and cowgirls make their final push at punching their tickets to the National Finals Rodeo. Experience all the highlights, the heartbreak, and the glory from this pivotal event.

programme.title: Live: Horse Racing
programme.desc: Following all the action from the world of horse racing.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: Hollywood star Jennifer Tilly continues to crush, as the penultimate session of this high stakes cash game begins. Meanwhile, time is running out for the Loose Cannon to bank a profit, and Gerard Piqué tries to recover some of his five-figure losses.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: It's all to play for in Las Vegas, as this high stakes cash game concludes. Jennifer Tilly and Sam Grafton battle for supremacy, while Gerard Piqué is determined to finally get the better of the poker pros and dig himself out of a hole.

programme.title: Women's Football Weekly
programme.desc: Discover the best of the action from the top divisions of women's football in Italy, Germany and the Netherlands with this brand-new highlights show.

programme.title: NHRA Pro Mod Series
programme.desc: Highlights and features from the drag-racing series.

programme.title: NHRA in 30
programme.desc: When fierce rivalries collide with 11,000 horsepower and nitro methane fuel, it's not just a race-it's a battle on wheels. Welcome to the Top Moments of the Nitro Callouts, a no-holds-barred, bracket style showdown where Top Fuel Dragsters and Nitro Funny Cars go head-to-head in a race-within-a-race format where drivers throw down the gauntlet, call out their rivals and deliver edge-of-your-seat action, wild upsets, and head-to-head battles.

programme.title: NHRA Drag Racing
programme.desc: From Texas Motorplex in Ennis, Texas.

programme.title: Kevin Harvick's Happy Hour
programme.desc: NASCAR legend Kevin Harvick shares his expert opinion on NASCAR news and interviews the biggest names in sports and the racing world.

programme.title: The Joel Klatt Show: A College Football Podcast
programme.desc: Joel Klatt breaks down the biggest topics in the world of college football.

programme.title: OutKick the Show with Clay Travis
programme.desc: OutKick the Show, hosted by Clay Travis, is a no-holds-barred program where Travis delivers his unfiltered take on the most talked-about headlines in sports and more.

programme.title: Big Noon Kickoff Presents Bear Bets
programme.desc: Betting expert Chris "The Bear" Fallica hosts the Big Noon Kickoff college football show.

programme.title: Backlash
programme.desc: A police detective (Larry Blake) questions a lawyer's wife (Jean Rogers) and others about a murder case.

programme.title: Pickup on South Street
programme.desc: In New York City, an insolent pickpocket, Skip McCoy (Richard Widmark), inadvertently sets off a chain of events when he targets ex-prostitute Candy (Jean Peters) and steals her wallet. Unaware that she has been making deliveries of highly classified information to the communists, Candy, who has been trailed by FBI agents for months in hopes of nabbing the spy ringleader, is sent by her ex-boyfriend, Joey (Richard Kiley), to find Skip and retrieve the valuable microfilm he now holds.

programme.title: House of Bamboo
programme.desc: In post-World War II Tokyo, Eddie Kenner (Robert Stack) is on a U.S. Army special assignment to investigate a murderous clique led by ex-soldier Sandy Dawson (Robert Ryan). Kenner ingratiates himself with Dawson and his inner circle, gaining their trust while starting a relationship with Mariko (Shirley Yamaguchi), the wife of a murdered gang member. But the sinister Dawson suspects there's a traitor among them when the police are tipped off about a planned robbery.

programme.title: Compulsion
programme.desc: Sociopathic students Artie Straus (Bradford Dillman) and Judd Steiner (Dean Stockwell) murder a boy in a philosophical exercise to commit the flawless crime. Despite their precautions, one of them inadvertently left a key piece of evidence at the crime scene, and they have been arrested and put on trial. It's up to their nationally famous attorney (Orson Welles) to save these misguided souls from execution. The film is based on the infamous Leopold and Loeb case of 1924.

programme.title: The Third Secret
programme.desc: A U.S. newscaster (Stephen Boyd) questions other patients (Jack Hawkins, Richard Attenborough) about the alleged suicide of his London analyst.

programme.title: The Night House
programme.desc: Reeling from the unexpected death of her husband, Beth is left alone at the lakeside home he built for her. She tries her best to keep it together -- but then the nightmares come. Disturbing visions of a presence in the house call to her, beckoning Beth with a ghostly allure. She soon begins searching for answers, only to find secrets both strange and disturbing.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: After the death of her mother and having no other known relatives, Evie takes a DNA test and discovers a long-lost cousin she never knew she had. Invited by her newfound family to a lavish wedding in the English countryside, Evie's at first seduced by the sexy aristocratic host. However, she's soon thrust into a nightmare of survival as she uncovers twisted secrets about her family history and the unsettling intentions behind their sinful generosity.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside of him is soon unleashed.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside of him is soon unleashed.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: After the death of her mother and having no other known relatives, Evie takes a DNA test and discovers a long-lost cousin she never knew she had. Invited by her newfound family to a lavish wedding in the English countryside, Evie's at first seduced by the sexy aristocratic host. However, she's soon thrust into a nightmare of survival as she uncovers twisted secrets about her family history and the unsettling intentions behind their sinful generosity.

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: Successful author Veronica Henley is finishing a book tour before she returns home to her husband and daughter. But a shocking turn of events is about to upend Veronica's existence, plunging her into a horrifying reality that forces her to confront her past, present and future -- before it's too late.

programme.title: Man in the Attic
programme.desc: Jack the Ripper's rampage has all of London gripped in fear -- no matter how many constables patrol the streets, streetwalkers continue to turn up dead. On the night that a fourth woman is killed, the mysterious Slade (Jack Palance) rents out the attic of William and Helen Harley. Later, he meets their niece, Lily Bonner (Constance Smith), an actress. While he intrigues her, his behavior and obsessions arouse suspicion that Slade could be Jack the Ripper -- and Lily his next victim.

programme.title: Heaven With a Barbed Wire Fence
programme.desc: Joe (Glenn Ford), a clerk in New York City, hits the road to claim the land he bought in Arizona. But having spent all of his savings on the land, he must hitchhike. He meets a drifter named Tony (Nicholas Conte) and then Spanish refugee Anita (Jean Rogers). Together the three run into the "Professor" (Raymond Walburn), an erudite hobo. The quartet travel across the country, getting into scrapes, avoiding the police and encountering others hit hard by the Great Depression.

programme.title: The Silent Call
programme.desc: A dog embarks on a journey from Nevada to Los Angeles to find the family (Roger Mobley, David McLean, Gail Russell) that left it behind.

programme.title: Call of the Wild
programme.desc: This early adaptation of the classic Jack London novel follows Jack Thornton (Clark Gable) as he travels across Alaska during the Klondike Gold Rush. When he finds another Yukon-bound man, who treats his sled dogs cruelly, Jack purchases a dog named Buck, who leads the way toward the gold. But Jack reconsiders his journey when he finds Claire Blake (Loretta Young), a woman recently abandoned by her husband in the Alaskan wilderness, and the couple develops a romance.

programme.title: My Darling Clementine
programme.desc: In the middle of a long cattle drive, Wyatt Earp (Henry Fonda) and his brothers stop off for a night in the town of Tombstone. The next morning they find their cattle stolen, and one of the brothers is dead. Earp suspects the Clanton family, owners of the O.K. Corral, but wants his revenge to be legal. He becomes sheriff of Tombstone and forges a rough peace with an alcoholic gambler, Doc Holiday (Victor Mature). Earp also takes a liking to Holiday's former girlfriend, Clementine (Cathy Downs).

programme.title: The Beautiful Blonde From Bashful Bend
programme.desc: A saloon girl (Betty Grable) shoots at her boyfriend (Cesar Romero), leaves town, poses as a schoolteacher and woos a mineowner (Rudy Vallee).

programme.title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
programme.desc: During the 1880s, Englishman Jonathan Tibbs (Kenneth More) journeys to the American West to make a fortune selling firearms. However, when he stops a Native American ambush using his gentlemanly manners, he becomes a hero to the people of the town of Fractured Jaw and is made sheriff. In over his head, Jonathan attempts to bring justice to the anarchic town by befriending a local Sioux tribe. He also tries to win over Kate (Jayne Mansfield), a feisty bartender.

programme.title: Bad Girls
programme.desc: Prostitutes Cody (Madeleine Stowe), Anita (Mary Stuart Masterson), Eileen (Andie MacDowell) and Lily (Drew Barrymore), work a saloon in the Old West. They decide to flee the bordello for a better life elsewhere, but trouble follows close behind. They're tailed by Pinkerton detectives, Cody's savings are stolen by a bandit (James Russo), and Eileen is wrongfully jailed for bank robbery. Now the remaining three girls must decide whether to liberate their friend or their funds first.

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: Successful author Veronica Henley is finishing a book tour before she returns home to her husband and daughter. But a shocking turn of events is about to upend Veronica's existence, plunging her into a horrifying reality that forces her to confront her past, present and future -- before it's too late.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: Slim and Queen's first date takes an unexpected turn when a policeman pulls them over for a minor traffic violation. When the situation escalates, Slim takes the officer's gun and shoots him in self-defense. Now labeled cop killers in the media, Slim and Queen feel that they have no choice but to go on the run and evade the law. When a video of the incident goes viral, the unwitting outlaws soon become a symbol of trauma, terror, grief and pain for people all across the country.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: In 1988, a groundbreaking new group revolutionizes music and pop culture, changing and influencing hip-hop forever. N.W.A's first studio album, "Straight Outta Compton," stirs controversy with its brutally honest depiction of life in Southern Los Angeles. With guidance from veteran manager Jerry Heller, band members Ice Cube (O'Shea Jackson Jr.), Dr. Dre (Corey Hawkins), Eazy-E, DJ Yella and MC Ren navigate their way through the industry, acquiring fame, fortune and a place in history.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: In 1988, a groundbreaking new group revolutionizes music and pop culture, changing and influencing hip-hop forever. N.W.A's first studio album, "Straight Outta Compton," stirs controversy with its brutally honest depiction of life in Southern Los Angeles. With guidance from veteran manager Jerry Heller, band members Ice Cube (O'Shea Jackson Jr.), Dr. Dre (Corey Hawkins), Eazy-E, DJ Yella and MC Ren navigate their way through the industry, acquiring fame, fortune and a place in history.

programme.title: Sleeping With the Enemy
programme.desc: After faking her death in order to flee from her violent husband, Martin (Patrick Bergin), Laura Burney (Julia Roberts) leaves Cape Cod and moves to Iowa, where she adopts a new identity and starts dating a local teacher, Ben Woodward (Kevin Anderson). Martin, meanwhile, unearths evidence suggesting that she isn't dead, and when her mother confirms this, he tracks her to Iowa. He finds Laura and Ben and confronts them, forcing her to fight for her life once again.

programme.title: The Best of Everything
programme.desc: Three ambitious working girls of 1950s Manhattan share their secretarial work and later a home together: Gregg (Suzy Parker) is an aspiring actress whose director is using her; April (Diane Baker) is left pregnant and alone; and Caroline (Hope Lange) finds solace in the arms of an editor (Stephen Boyd). Together the three contend with romantic disappointments, office politics and the threat that their dreams for a fulfilling career will be cut short by marriage, children and inertia.

programme.title: Night People
programme.desc: A U.S. soldier stationed in West Berlin after the end of World War II is kidnapped and held captive in East Berlin. Col. Steve Van Dyke (Gregory Peck) is leading the kidnapping investigation, which becomes more complex as he is forced to deal with deceit, conspiracies and double identities. As Van Dyke begins to discover the truth about the case, he finds himself in a perilous situation -- even his closest ally, his former lover Hoffy (Anita Björk), may not be who she says she is.

programme.title: Rio Conchos
programme.desc: When a shipment of repeating rifles is stolen from the U.S. Cavalry, Capt. Haven (Stuart Whitman) and Sgt. Franklyn are sent to recover them and enlist the aid of an alcoholic former confederate and Indian hater, James Lassiter (Richard Boone) and a Mexican murderer, Rodriguez (Tony Franciosa). Lassiter, who owns one of the rifles, says it came from his embittered former commander Col. Pardee, while an Apache woman informant reveals that Pardee intends to sell the stolen arms to her people.

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: Lt. Bruno Stachel (George Peppard), a brash German World War I fighter pilot, is driven to shoot down 20 enemy planes, thus garnering him the Blue Max, a coveted medal. His superior, Count von Klugermann (James Mason), is aware that Bruno will stop at nothing to receive the honor, and admires his tenacity. The count's nephew, Willi (Jeremy Kemp), is Bruno's main competition for the prize, but Bruno is determined to eliminate his adversary and secure the honor for himself.

programme.title: The Sand Pebbles
programme.desc: In 1926, the USS San Pablo patrols the Yangtze River during the clashes between Chiang Kai-shek's communists and Chinese warlords. Eight-year veteran machinist Jake Holman (Steve McQueen), new to the self-named sand pebbles crew, immediately draws deep suspicion due to his independent streak. Ordered to protect Americans, including schoolteacher Shirley Eckhart (Candice Bergen), Jake and the gunboat crew are unwittingly drawn into a bitter nationalistic feud that holds grim consequences.

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: Ed Harris and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio are formerly married petroleum engineers who still have some issues to work out. They are drafted to assist a gung-ho Navy SEAL (Michael Biehn) with a top-secret recovery operation: a nuclear sub has been ambushed and sunk, under mysterious circumstances, in some of the deepest waters on Earth.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: After climatologist Jack Hall is largely ignored by U.N. officials when presenting his environmental concerns, his research proves true when a superstorm develops, setting off catastrophic natural disasters throughout the world; trying to get to his son, Sam, who is trapped in New York with his friend Laura and others, Jack and his crew must travel by foot from Philadelphia, braving the elements, to get to Sam before it's too late.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defense program. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman (Billy Bob Thornton) determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper (Bruce Willis), who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. (Ben Affleck), who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter (Liv Tyler), until the mission proves otherwise.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Han's tomb is discovered, and Rick O'Connell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on US soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Han's tomb is discovered, and Rick O'Connell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion'.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on US soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the network's money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the city's subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that they're the ones being hunted.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: The princess of the Amazons is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: King of Killers

However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.desc: Veteran writer, reporter and radio personality Paul Finebaum built a legion of loyal sports fans as the "Voice of the SEC" during 20 years hosting his Birmingham, Ala.-based radio talk show. When ESPN launched the SEC Network in 2014, it was only natural that Finebaum became its first on-air hire, bringing his radio show -- and those passionate followers -- with him. Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. programme.title: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Bills (4-1) hit the road for a prime-time game against the Falcons (2-2). Buffalo won the last meeting 29-15 in 2022. Atlanta returns from bye. The Bills suffered their first loss of 2025 on Sunday Night Football against the Patriots in Week 5.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: Silent Hill

The town is surrounded by a potent darkness, and the human survivors fight a losing battle against it.

programme.desc: When her closest friend commits suicide after being manipulated by the popular crowd, quiet and bookish Rachel Lang (Emily Bergl) decides to get back at the guilty parties. When Rachel discovers that she has superhuman abilities, it ups the stakes for her revenge, echoing a supernatural incident that occurred decades before.

programme.title: Quarantine

A late-night distress call takes them to a Los Angeles apartment building, where the police are investigating a report of horrific screams. The TV team and emergency workers find an old woman, who suddenly attacks with teeth bared. What's more, Angela and company find that the building has been sealed by CDC workers. Then the attacks really begin.

This time, the masked killer has set his sights on pretty disc jockey Vanita "Stretch" Brock (Caroline Williams), who teams up with Texas lawman Lefty Enright (Dennis Hopper) to battle the psychopath and his family deep within their lair, a macabre abandoned amusement park.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw 3D
programme.desc: Decades ago, residents of Newt, Texas, long suspected that the Sawyer family was responsible for the disappearances of many people. When their suspicions finally were confirmed, vigilantes torched the Sawyer compound and killed every member of the family -- or so they thought. Much later, a young woman named Heather (Alexandra Daddario) learns that she has inherited Texas property from an unknown relative, and she is unaware of horrors that await in the mansion's dank cellar.

Their epic showdown leads them to an encounter with the mysterious Elijah Price, the criminal mastermind who holds critical secrets for both men.

programme.title: Once Bitten

After luring Mark away from a club, the countess drinks his blood, but the hapless guy isn't sure what has happened until he starts exhibiting unusual symptoms.

During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “

programme.desc: Lloyd moves in and tries to make nice by helping out with chores, but he just gets in the way. Pythor has awoken the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs and an all out snake war has taken over Ninjago. The Ninja are not faring well, when a mysterious Samurai shows up and saves the day.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes Guardians of the Galaxy: The Thanos Threat
programme.desc: The Guardians of the Galaxy protect the Build Stone. When Thanos, Ronan, Nebula and the Ravagers seek to possess the Build Stone, the fate of the universe depends on the Guardians of the Galaxy to protect it.

programme.title: Fright Knight
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds “The Book of Fear.” It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her “knighmarish” power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest – as they fight off the Whipperella – that they we find out Aaron's true fear – the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Market Day

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik pretends to retire, and lures Sonic and Tails into a phony vacation resort, laden with booby-traps set by Scratch and Grounder. But Sonic takes the bungee jumping, hang gliding, and skydiving in stride, and gives the bashes the bots.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Tails gets trapped in the "Warp of Confusion" (an Escher-like world of another dimension) by Robotnik's cousin, Dr. Warpnik, Sonic comes to the rescue and traps Robotnik and his badniks in the warp.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and The Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's underground air base in a mission to reprogram the launch data on Robotnik's fleet of Stealth-Bot aircraft. While attempting to reprogram the Stealth-Bot computer system.

programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters run into a Swashbuckler, named Ari, battling Swat-Bots. Sonic diverts them, allowing Ari to escape. After hearing that Robotnik is holding his band of Freedom Fighters hostage, Ari decides to help Sonic free them.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a Brain Evolution Achievement Negatizer, or B.E.A.N., in order to make all of Mobius stupid. But instead of turning Sonic and Tails into dummies, the BEAN device turns them into three year old babies!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Peter Pan leads Wendy and her two brothers on an adventure involving Captain Hook and his band of pirates.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildred's world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Peter Pan leads Wendy and her two brothers on an adventure involving Captain Hook and his band of pirates.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildred's world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends meet, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life, just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save the town from Slappy's wicked plan.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A ragtag team of international talking dog mascots must leap to the rescue of their teams and thwart the plans of some villains trying to sabotage the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: After his latest play flops, JM Barrie finds distraction when he befriends the Llewelyn Davies family, four young boys and their widowed mother Sylvia. His relationship with them threatens his marriage and standing in society, but results in the creation of `Peter Pan'.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The year is 1926, and Newt Scamander has just completed a global excursion to find and document an extraordinary array of magical creatures. Arriving in New York for a brief stopover, he might have come and gone without incident, were it not for a No-Maj named Jacob, a misplaced magical case, and the escape of some of Newt's fantastic beasts, which could spell trouble for both the wizarding and No-Maj worlds.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg that's hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When Yang, his adopted daughter's beloved android, suddenly malfunctions, a father searches way to repair him. In the process, he discovers that life has been passing in front of him and he has drifted away from his family.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villians
programme.desc: Celebrate Halloween by facing horror at it's finest and terror in every form: from the haunted halls of `The Shining' to the unseen menace of `The Invisible Man'.

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, she's left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth with plans to steal Earth's resources, and when a confrontation with the invaders knocks out the Navy's radar capability, American and Japanese forces must work together to find a way to save the planet.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturn's moon, Titan.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth with plans to steal Earth's resources, and when a confrontation with the invaders knocks out the Navy's radar capability, American and Japanese forces must work together to find a way to save the planet.

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.'s attempt at winning a grieving widow's heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.'s attempt at winning a grieving widow's heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether they would be better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

Earth's billions of inhabitants are unaware that the planet has an expiration date. With the warnings of an American scientist, world leaders begin secret preparations for the survival of select members of society. When the global cataclysm finally occurs, failed writer Jackson Curtis tries to lead his family to safety as the world starts falling apart.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the 'Rage' virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena and cab driver Frank, and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In 2041 central Europe, Detective Em investigates the case of a murdered couple where a restoration team brings one of them back to life.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

Earth's billions of inhabitants are unaware that the planet has an expiration date. With the warnings of an American scientist, world leaders begin secret preparations for the survival of select members of society. When the global cataclysm finally occurs, failed writer Jackson Curtis tries to lead his family to safety as the world starts falling apart.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A group of scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal them. Only one man survives. He has two aims: to find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owner's payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.title: Pitch Invaders
programme.desc: Anna Mowbray and Ali Williams work with billionaire Bill Foley to launch an Auckland football team in the A-League. In just 10 months, they must build, recruit, and train a squad.

programme.title: This One's For Alex
programme.desc: Alex Paulsen's controversial switch to Auckland FC has everyone talking. Now, he faces his former club in the first-ever New Zealand Derby - a match overflowing with rivalry and emotion.

programme.title: How Long Can This Go On?
programme.desc: Riding a wave of success, Auckland FC proves that they're the real deal. However, the squad faces a new challenge when a string of injuries sidelines some key players.

programme.title: The Gaffer
programme.desc: After nearly two decades at Sydney FC, Steve Corica was shown the door. Now at the helm of Auckland FC, Corica faces the daunting task of leading his new squad against his former club.

programme.title: What We Do For Football
programme.desc: Kiwi Francis De Vries surprises everyone with his talent and shares the tough realities of professional football. As they climb the A-League ladder, Auckland FC prepares for some crucial games.

programme.title: New Kids On The Pitch
programme.desc: With the third and final clash against the Phoenix looming, pressure mounts on Auckland FC to make it a clean sweep. Meanwhile, homegrown AFC players look to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: The End Is Near
programme.desc: As the season nears its final stretch, Alex Paulsen's departure raises major questions over the club's future. With AFC's star goalkeeper on his way out, all eyes turn to Michael Woud.

programme.title: We Go Again
programme.desc: AFC secures the Premiers Plate, making history with a record-breaking debut season. With silverware in the cabinet, the pressure intensifies as attention shifts to the Championship.

programme.title: Live NFL
programme.desc: Cincinnati Bengals v Pittsburgh Steelers (Kick-off 1.15am). Coverage of the week seven match at Paycor Stadium. The Steelers have won four of the past five meetings between the two teams but did lose the last fixture between the sides in January 2025, as the Bengals came away with a thrilling 19-17 victory in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyone's behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a family's pet cat is killed, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which is believed to revive the dead. However, in doing so, they create a monster.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is actually a bloodthirsty vampire.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in and tries to get her claws on the child.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in and tries to get her claws on the child.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway upstate with her parents, Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behaviour as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. However, as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Los Angeles, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a former baseball player moves into a new house with his wife and two children. Soon, a dark secret from the home's past unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror.

programme.title: I Don't Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous holiday.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway upstate with her parents, Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behaviour as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss' Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth'. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: I Don't Understand You

programme.title: Hollow Man

Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
